description: Short-Stay UAE Tourist Visa (30 or 60 Days) for Tourism/Leisure from India. Streamlined via Emirates Visa Services (DVPC) for a single consistent application pipeline.

meta.fee_euro_approx: N/A (Visa fee charged in AED/INR via Emirates DVPC)
meta.fee_inr_approx: 6000–12000 depending on visa duration and DVPC pricing
meta.max_stay: 30 Days or 60 Days depending on chosen visa type
meta.passport_validity: Minimum 6 months from intended date of arrival
meta.photo_spec: 45x55mm, white background, high resolution, no shadows
meta.min_funds_requirement: Recommended: ₹50,000+ in bank account, confirmed return ticket, and valid accommodation booking. Sponsor documents required if staying with family.

documents.title: Original Passport + Scanned Copy
documents.description: Passport valid for 6 months from travel date. Clear colour scan of first/last page. Attach old passports if they contain travel history.

documents.title: UAE Visa Photo
documents.description: Recent 45x55mm photograph with white background, high resolution, no shadows, neutral expression.

documents.title: Return Flight Ticket (Mandatory)
documents.description: Confirmed return or onward flight booking is required for visa approval under Emirates DVPC.

documents.title: Hotel Booking or Sponsor Documents
documents.description: Fully refundable hotel booking OR sponsor’s Emirates ID + UAE residence visa copy + address details (if staying with family).

documents.title: Bank Statement (Recommended for Indians)
documents.description: Last 2–3 months' bank statement showing healthy balance. Helps ensure smoother approval for first-time travellers.

documents.title: Sponsor Documents (If Applicable)
documents.description: If family in UAE is sponsoring: Emirates ID, UAE Residence Visa copy, Passport copy. Used when applying through sponsor flow.

documents.title: UAE Visa Application Form
documents.description: DVPC auto-fills the digital form based on passport details. No manual form filling required.

steps_flow.title: Start Visa Application (Emirates Visa Page)
steps_flow.description: Begin your UAE Tourist Visa process through the official Emirates Visa Services (DVPC). This pipeline handles document upload, verification, and delivery of the eVisa.

steps_flow.title: Log In to Emirates Account
steps_flow.description: Create or log in to your Emirates account. All visa submissions, document uploads, and tracking will happen using this single account.

steps_flow.title: Open 'Manage Booking' and Access Visa Services
steps_flow.description: If you have an Emirates ticket, enter your booking reference and access the DVPC visa service. Upload passport scan, photo, and travel details here.

steps_flow.title: Upload Required Documents
steps_flow.description: Upload clear digital scans: Passport, Photo, Return Ticket, Hotel Booking/Sponsor Docs. Ensure all documents are high resolution and match DVPC specifications.

steps_flow.title: Pay Visa Fees via DVPC
steps_flow.description: Pay the applicable visa fee (30-day or 60-day). Payment options include Debit/Credit Cards. Fees vary based on duration and urgency.

steps_flow.title: Track Visa Application
steps_flow.description: Monitor your visa status through Emirates ‘Manage Booking’. DVPC updates the status at each processing stage. Standard processing: 3–5 working days.

steps_flow.title: Download Your UAE e-Visa
steps_flow.description: Once approved, your UAE Tourist Visa (PDF eVisa) will be emailed to you and also available inside your Emirates account. Print a copy and keep a digital backup.
